languages.text: "Кому вы поверили? Я — легенда Простора, и среди моих деяний угнетение простолюдинов не числится. Очевидно же, что враги пытаются очернить мое имя".
"And you believed them? I am a legend of the Expanse, and oppression of commoners is not in the history of my deeds. Is it not obvious? Our enemies are trying to sully my name!"
languages.original_text: "Кому вы поверили? Я — легенда Простора, и среди моих деяний угнетение простолюдинов не числится. Очевидно же, что враги пытаются очернить мое имя".

traits.locale_text: "And you believed them? I am a legend of the Expanse, and oppression of commoners is not in the history of my deeds. Is it not obvious? Our enemies are trying to sully my name!"
"And you believed them? I am a legend of the Expanse, and oppression of commoners is not in the history of my deeds. Is it not obvious? Our enemies are trying to sully my name!"
"And you believed them? I am a legend of the Expanse, and oppression of commoners is not in the history of my deeds. Is it not obvious? Our enemies are trying to sully my name!"

"And you believed them? I am a legend of the Expanse, and oppression of commoners is not in the history of my deeds. Is it not obvious? Our enemies are trying to sully my name!"

languages.text: "Und Ihr habt ihnen geglaubt? Ich bin eine Legende der Ausdehnung und die Unterdrückung einfacher Leute steht nicht auf der Liste meiner Taten. Ist das nicht offensichtlich? Unsere Feinde versuchen, meinen Namen zu beschmutzen!"
languages.original_text: "And you believed them? I am a legend of the Expanse, and oppression of commoners is not in the history of my deeds. Is it not obvious? Our enemies are trying to sully my name!"

traits.locale_text: "Und Ihr habt ihnen geglaubt? Ich bin eine Legende der Ausdehnung und die Unterdrückung einfacher Leute steht nicht auf der Liste meiner Taten. Ist das nicht offensichtlich? Unsere Feinde versuchen, meinen Namen zu beschmutzen!"

languages.text: « Et vous les avez crus ? Je suis une légende des Étendues et opprimer des roturiers n'a jamais fait partie de ma geste. Vous ne comprenez pas ? Nos ennemis tentent de salir mon nom ! »
languages.original_text: "And you believed them? I am a legend of the Expanse, and oppression of commoners is not in the history of my deeds. Is it not obvious? Our enemies are trying to sully my name!"

traits.locale_text: « Et vous les avez crus ? Je suis une légende des Étendues et opprimer des roturiers n'a jamais fait partie de ma geste. Vous ne comprenez pas ? Nos ennemis tentent de salir mon nom ! »

languages.text: «¿Y les creyó? Yo soy una leyenda en la Extensión, y oprimir a la plebe no figura entre mis hazañas. ¿Acaso no es evidente? ¡Nuestros enemigos pretenden mancillar mi buen nombre!».
languages.original_text: "And you believed them? I am a legend of the Expanse, and oppression of commoners is not in the history of my deeds. Is it not obvious? Our enemies are trying to sully my name!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Y les creyó? Yo soy una leyenda en la Extensión, y oprimir a la plebe no figura entre mis hazañas. ¿Acaso no es evidente? ¡Nuestros enemigos pretenden mancillar mi buen nombre!».

languages.text: 「それで、連中を信じたのか？私はエクスパンスの伝説だ。平民の弾圧など、私の功績の履歴には存在しない。明らかなことだろう？敵は私の名を汚そうとしているのだ！」
languages.original_text: "And you believed them? I am a legend of the Expanse, and oppression of commoners is not in the history of my deeds. Is it not obvious? Our enemies are trying to sully my name!"

traits.locale_text: 「それで、連中を信じたのか？私はエクスパンスの伝説だ。平民の弾圧など、私の功績の履歴には存在しない。明らかなことだろう？敵は私の名を汚そうとしているのだ！」

languages.text: “你们居然听他们胡说八道？我是科罗努斯扩区的传奇人物，我从来没压迫过任何平民。这一切不是很明显吗？我们的敌人打算抹黑我的名声！”
languages.original_text: "And you believed them? I am a legend of the Expanse, and oppression of commoners is not in the history of my deeds. Is it not obvious? Our enemies are trying to sully my name!"

traits.locale_text: “你们居然听他们胡说八道？我是科罗努斯扩区的传奇人物，我从来没压迫过任何平民。这一切不是很明显吗？我们的敌人打算抹黑我的名声！”

languages.text: "Siz de onlara inandınız mı? Ben Enginlik'in efsanesiyim, yaptıklarım arasında avama zulmetmek yoktur. Her şey açık seçik değil mi? Düşmanlarımız ismimi lekelemeye çalışıyor!"
languages.original_text: "And you believed them? I am a legend of the Expanse, and oppression of commoners is not in the history of my deeds. Is it not obvious? Our enemies are trying to sully my name!"
